title: ImaginAb, Inc. Appoints Roger Crystal, MD As Vice President of Business Development
author: Michael Gibney
description: LOS ANGELES, SINGAPORE, and TOKYO, July 28, 2014 /PRNewswire/ -- ImaginAb, Inc. today announced today announced that it has appointed Roger Crystal, MD as Vice President of Business Development.
